jobTitleUrlData.Description:
Job Description

Graphic Designer Intern (Print & Publication Design)
Locations: Panaji (Goa), and Kolkata (WB)

About Us:

At Report Yak, we craft engaging corporate reports (Annual, Integrated, Sustainability and ESG) for top-tier organisations. We blend data with storytelling to create impactful reports that drive action and inspire change.

We're Seeking:
A Graphic Design Intern with expertise in print and publication design for our team in Panaji (Goa). You'll work closely with our team of writers to bring our reports to life and create stunning visuals that engage and inspire our readers.

What we would like you to have:

A degree in Graphic Design or a related field

Excellent communication skills

Sounds interesting Drop your CV and cover letter at [Confidential Information]

  • You gain real world work experiences at an internationally reputable high-tech company;
  • Learn real world knowledge, work ethics, team spirits;
  • Receive 3 certificates, and
  • It is short & convenient: you can work from anywhere, makes you much more employable and competitive in the job market.

jobTitleUrlData.Description:
Job Description

1. Social Media Management:
Creating and curating content for various social media platforms.
Engaging with followers, responding to comments, and messages.
Analyzing social media metrics to track performance.
2. Search Engine Optimization (SEO):
Conducting keyword research.
Optimizing website content, meta tags, and descriptions.
Building backlinks and improving website authority.
3. Content Creation:
Writing blog posts, articles, website copy, and social media posts.
Developing multimedia content such as videos, infographics, and podcasts.
4. Email Marketing:
Creating email campaigns.
Managing subscriber lists and segmentation.
Analyzing email open rates, click-through rates, and conversions.
5. Paid Advertising:
Managing pay-per-click (PPC) campaigns on platforms like Google Ads and social media ads.
Setting budgets, targeting audiences, and optimizing ad performance.
6. Analytics and Reporting:
Monitoring website traffic using tools like Google Analytics.
Generating reports on key performance indicators (KPIs) such as conversion rates, bounce rates, and traffic sources.
7. Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO):
Analyzing user behavior on websites and landing pages.
A/B testing different elements to improve conversion rates.
8. Digital Strategy Development:
Collaborating with team members to develop comprehensive digital marketing strategies.
Setting goals, defining target audiences, and selecting appropriate channels.
9. Influencer Marketing:
Identifying and collaborating with influencers relevant to the brand.
Negotiating partnerships and managing influencer campaigns.
10. Online Reputation Management:
Monitoring online mentions and reviews of the brand.
Responding to customer feedback and addressing any issues promptly.
Implementing strategies to enhance the brand's online reputation.

Industry: Industrial Automation / Industrial Equipment Mfg / Machinery

jobTitle: Field Marketing Intern - B&M Retail II Gurgaon

jobTitleUrlData.Description:
Job Description



Designation: Intern

Role: Field Marketing

Department: B&M Retail

Location: Gurgaon/Delhi/Noida/Faridabad

About Tata 1mg

Tata 1mg is a trusted health partner for end consumers and large institutions. Our Mission is to make healthcare understandable, accessible and affordable for all Indians. Over the past three years, we-ve worked to build a healthcare platform that guides customers to the right and affordable care. Today, Tata 1mg is present in 1000+ cities- And we're just getting started. Leading the chart as one of the top consumer health platforms through ePharmacy, eDiagnostics, e-consult and offline stores, Tata 1mg has delivered over 15M ePharmacy orders, 2M eDiagnostics orders & 1M+ organic users/day in 2022 and we are just getting started. Our strongest asset is our 6400+ people enabling us to deliver on our mission consistently.

Know more about us:

Brief about the Team

B&M Retail vertical of TATA 1mg is a unique setup of Retail, where we offer best-in-class pharmacy, diagnostics, and e-consultation under one roof. The team is responsible for In-Store operations execution, fulfilling error-free medicine dispensing, in-store Product Management & the best-in-class In-store customer experience.The team closely works with Warehousing, Merchandising, and Marketing teams to Identify customer requirements and fulfill them with quality and commitment.



What will you do

  • Execute and oversee on-ground field activation activities, ensuring the successful implementation of planned strategies
  • Identify and evaluate potential locations for field activation, considering factors such as footfall, demographics, and brand visibility
  • Plan and execute camps to support ground staff, engaging with the target audience, and effectively communicating the brand message
  • Track and report key performance indicators (KPIs), including the count of successful camps conducted and Gross Merchandise Value (GMV) earned from the allocated camps on a monthly basis




What we are looking for

  • Familiarity with Delhi NCR, including Gurgaon, Delhi, Noida, and Faridabad, with an understanding of key locations suitable for field activation
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to engage effectively with both team members and the target audience during on-ground activities
  • Proactive and able to take initiative in identifying opportunities for field activation, location scouting, and camp execution
  • Ability to work collaboratively with a diverse team and independently manage assigned responsibilities
  • Results-oriented mindset with a focus on achieving and exceeding monthly KPIs, contributing to the overall success of the activation campaigns What you will Achieve
  • Learning the steps involved in the sales cycle, from prospecting to closing deals, and the importance of each stage in achieving sales success
  • Gaining a deep understanding of the products or services offered by the company, including features, benefits, and value propositions.
  • Developing techniques to address and overcome objections or concerns raised by prospects during the sales process
  • Acquiring knowledge of various sales techniques, such as consultative selling, solution selling, and relationship selling, and when to apply them based on customer needs
  • On successful completion of the internship you'll be receiving a certificate for the same. If anyone stands out might also get a chance to bag a full time offer.
  • You will get INR 5000/- per month stipend and duration 60-90 days.




Why Join Us

Tata 1mg provides one of the most exciting and high-growth environments to work in. You get the added benefit of working in a prestigious legacy brand like Tata and a highly dynamic and versatile startup like 1mg. Being an integral part of the B&M Retail team will provide a great opportunity to scale up a business to great heights leveraging the existing capabilities of Tata 1mg.

Disclaimer:

Tata 1mg is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. All employment decisions at Tata 1mg shall be made without discrimination, harassment or less favorable treatment of any employee or job applicant, either directly or indirectly, on the grounds of age, colour, physical ability, ethnic origin, nationality, religion, gender, family status, marital status, prenatal status, gender reassignment, or sexual orientation. All employment decisions are based on business needs, job requirements, competence and merit.

Job Description

Job Description: Marketing Intern

Company Overview:

Unacademy has grown to become India's Largest Learning Platform. We are on a mission to democratize access to high-quality education in India and provide the most transformative learning experience. We use technology to empower Top Educators and create a community of Learners. We strive to unlock the full potential of every Learner, fostering a world where knowledge knows no boundaries and anyone can achieve their academic goals

Position: Marketing Intern

Location: Hyderabad, Chennai, Kochi, Nellore, Mumbai, Goa, Gujarat, Whole Maharashtra, Delhi, Noida and north region.

Duration: 2 Months

Roles & Responsibilities:

  1. Identify potential channel partners and schedule meetings with them to discuss collaboration opportunities.
  2. Contact school principals from a provided list to inquire about their interest in Unacademy's Integrated Program (SIP).
  3. Reach out to coaching centers to understand their study material requirements and explore potential partnerships.
  4. Conduct regular visits to schools and colleges to promote Unacademy's programs and services.
  5. Make frequent calls to schools and coaching centers from a provided list to explore partnership opportunities.
  6. Develop the ability to effectively pitch diverse products and solutions for school partnerships.
  7. Arrange initial virtual meetings with school/college authorities and potential partners to discuss collaboration possibilities.
  8. Be willing to travel frequently as per the requirements of the role.

Basic Criteria:

  1. MBA students or MBA graduates with a specialization or interest in marketing or related fields.
  2. Must be willing to travel as per job requirements.
  3. Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written.

Sparks To ideas is website and Application development company in ahmedabad. we have many experience developer in our company and currently we are looking for the SEO Intern who having good knowledge in SEO.


Required Skills :- On Page SEO , Offpage SEO

Call Us :- 9510203204

Visit Us :- www.sparkstoideas.com

Address :- 406 Akshat tower near pakwan hotel opp rajpath club SG highway Ahmedabad

Job Description

Description

Job Title: Digital Marketing Intern (SEO & Social Media Focus)

Company: Cars24

Location: Gurgaon (hybrid)

Duration: 3-6 months

About Us:

Job Description:

Are you passionate about digital marketing, with a keen interest in SEO and social media Do you want to gain hands-on experience in a dynamic and innovative environment If so, we have the perfect opportunity for you! Join our team as a Digital Marketing Intern, where you will work closely with our experienced digital marketing professionals and contribute to our online presence and growth strategies.


Key Responsibilities:

  • SEO Optimization:
    • Assist in keyword research and analysis to identify opportunities.
    • Optimize website content for search engines (on-page SEO).
    • Help with technical SEO tasks such as site speed optimization and schema markup.
    • Monitor and report on website traffic, rankings, and SEO performance.
  • Content Creation:
    • Contribute to content creation efforts for blogs, social media, and other digital channels.
    • Ensure content aligns with SEO best practices and social media trends.
    • Collaborate with the content team to develop engaging and shareable content.
  • Analytics and Reporting:
    • Generate regular reports on SEO and social media performance.
    • Provide insights and recommendations based on data analysis.
    • Monitor industry trends and competitor activities.
  • Research and Learning:
    • Stay up-to-date with the latest SEO and social media trends and best practices.
    • Research and recommend new strategies and tools to improve digital marketing efforts.

Qualifications:

  • Currently pursuing or have a degree in Marketing, Digital Marketing, Communications, or a related field.
  • Strong interest in SEO and social media marketing.
  • Basic understanding of SEO principles and social media platforms.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
  • Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data.
  • Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and familiarity with digital marketing tools (e.g., Google Analytics, SEMrush, Hootsuite) is a plus.
  • Creative thinking and a willingness to learn and adapt.

Benefits:

  • Hands-on experience in SEO and social media marketing.
  • Mentorship and guidance from experienced professionals.
  • Exposure to a fast-paced and collaborative work environment.
  • Potential for future employment opportunities based on performance.

How to Apply:

If you're ready to jumpstart your career in digital marketing and gain valuable experience in SEO and social media, please submit your resume and a cover letter outlining your interest and qualifications for this internship. Be sure to include any relevant coursework, personal projects, or social media accounts you manage.

Application Deadline: this week

Job Description

Role Overview:

As a Product Marketing Intern on the Customer Lifecycle Management (CLM) team at Unacademy, you will play a crucial role in supporting the development and execution of product marketing initiatives.

Duration: 3 months

Stipend: 20k

Key Responsibilities:

  1. Market Research: Conduct research on industry trends, competitor products, and user behavior to inform product marketing strategies.
  2. Content Creation: Collaborate with the CLM team to create engaging and persuasive marketing content for product launches, feature updates, and user communications.
  3. Campaign Execution: Assist in the planning and execution of product marketing campaigns across various channels to drive user engagement and product adoption.
  4. User Communication: Support in crafting effective communication strategies to keep users informed about product enhancements, updates, and educational content.
  5. Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including product management, design, and performance marketing, to ensure alignment in messaging and goals.
  6. Data Analysis: Analyze user data and feedback to derive insights that can be used to refine product marketing strategies and improve user experience.

Requirements:

  1. Enrollment in a Bachelor's or Master's program: Pursuing a degree in Marketing, Business, Communication, or a related field.
  2. Strong Communication Skills: Excellent written and verbal communication skills with a keen eye for detail.
  3. Creativity: Ability to think creatively and contribute innovative ideas to marketing campaigns.
  4. Analytical Skills: Basic understanding of data analysis and the ability to draw insights from data.

Job Description

Design has played an integral in the success of all our marketing efforts at Plum.

Every campaign led by our marketing team - our reports, our playbooks, our campaigns, and even our games - has its own unique sub-brand. This not only helps us with recall but also lets us expand, experiment, and build our existing visual brand.

Every piece of social media content that people have come to associate with and love about Plum - our album art, sending a Plum to space, Rupi Kaur poems, and our customer announcements - has a visual quality that s designed to delight.

We like working with and hanging out with designers more than the others in the team.

Our marketing isn t about being traditional, safe, or boring. And for our aspirations to translate into outcomes, we need someone who can complement our ideas with a compelling visual brand.

Because pictures speak a thousand words.


What you will work on

Tl,dr: entertaining things that you d be proud to put on your portfolio.

As a Graphic Design Intern within our dynamic Marketing Team, you will play a pivotal role in shaping visual content for our brand. Over the course of 6 months, your responsibilities will span across various projects and platforms, focusing on:

Social Media:
- Collaborate closely with the marketing team to create content that resonates with our target audience on different social media channels.

Print Collaterals:
- Design print materials, including brochures, flyers, posters, and other promotional items, ensuring they align with the marketing objectives.
- Ensure all print materials adhere to brand guidelines and effectively convey key marketing messages.

Motion Design:
- Develop animated graphics and motion design elements to enhance digital marketing campaigns and presentations. Bring static designs to life through creative and visually appealing motion graphics.
Requirements:
  • Education: Bachelors degree in Graphic Design or a related field.
  • Experience: Proven experience as a Graphic Designer, showcased through a strong portfolio demonstrating design skills.
  • Technical Skills: Proficiency in industry-standard design software, such as Figma and Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign)Strong understanding of typography, color theory, and layout principles.
  • Communication: Excellent communication and presentation skills to effectively convey design concepts and ideas within the marketing context.
  • Attention to Detail: Strong attention to detail and a commitment to producing high-quality work that aligns with goals and strategies.
  • Collaboration: Ability to work collaboratively in a marketing team, taking creative direction and feedback positively.
  • Project Management: Strong project management skills with the ability to manage multiple tasks and deadlines simultaneously.

Company Description

We are a blockchain R&D studio, driven by our commitment to bridging (pun intended) the divide between foundational blockchains like Bitcoin and the thriving DeFi ecosystem. Our core expertise lies in solving intricate blockchain challenges through rigorous research in the realms of cryptography, game theory, and protocol design.

Our mission is to make web3 simple and hassle-free for everyone. No intimidating complexities, just pure potential. We began our journey in 2022, with a previous experience of building two billion-dollar web3 projects, Ren and Rook under our belt.

Our flagship product is the Catalog wallet (catalog.fi), a unique implementation of a multichain wallet that lets you use native bitcoin directly on any app. We also help power web3 projects like garden (garden.finance) to become cross-chain seamlessly.

We are a lean and fast moving team of like-minded people and are passionate about making our

mark in the DeFi space.

Role Description

As a designer at Catalog, you will play a pivotal role in transforming concepts and ideas into visually stunning and engaging designs. you will have the opportunity to kick-start your career in the world of design and contribute to exciting and impactful projects. This role is perfect for a creative individual with a passion for design, a keen eye for detail, and the ability to turn ideas into visually stunning creations. You wil have the opportunity to leverage your creativity, technical skills, and passion for design to deliver exceptional solutions that captivate audiences and enhance the overall user experience.

Responsibilities

  • Create eye-catching visuals, graphics, and layouts for various digital and print materials, ensuring they align with the company's brand identity.

  • Work closely with the senior design team and cross- functional teams to translate concepts and ideas into compelling design solutions.
  • Contribute to brainstorming sessions and idea generation, bringing fresh perspectives to creative projects.
  • Utilize design software tools (e.g., Adobe Creative Suite) to design and edit graphics, images, and other visual elements.
  • Review designs to ensure they meet quality standards and adhere to project requirements.
  • Stay updated on design trends, tools, and techniques, and apply this knowledge to improve your work.
  • Designers need to think outside the box, generate fresh ideas, and find innovative solutions to problems.

Skills Required

  • Excellent attention to detail and a creative mindset.
  • Strong communication and collaboration skills.
  • Ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines.

Join our Mission to Lead the Future of Snacking. Make It Matter.

Business Unit Summary

Mondelez India Foods Private Limited (formerly Cadbury India Ltd.) has been in India for over 70 years, making sure our mouth-watering and well-loved local and global brands such as chocolates, and powdered beverages, and biscuits, and and candies get safely into our customers hands-and mouths Headquartered in Mumbai, the company has more than 3,300 employees proudly working across sales offices in New Delhi, Mumbai, Kolkata and Chennai and in manufacturing facilities at Maharashtra, Madhya Pradesh, Himachal Pradesh and Andhra Pradesh, at our global Research & Development Technical Centre and Global Business Hub in Maharashtra and in a vast distribution network across the country. We are also proud to be recognised by Avatar as the Best Companies for Women in India in 2019 - the fourth time we've received this award.

Mondelz International is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation or preference, gender identity, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

jobTitleUrlData.AboutCompany: At Mondelz International, our purpose is to empower people to snack right through offering the right snack, for the right moment, made the right way. That means delivering a broader range of delicious, high-quality snacks that nourish life's moments, made with sustainable ingredients and packaging that consumers can feel good about. We have a rich portfolio of strong brands - both global and local. Including many household names such as Oreo, belVita and LU biscuits Cadbury Dairy Milk, Milka and Toblerone chocolate Sour Patch Kids candy and Trident gum. We are proud to hold the number 1 position globally in biscuits, chocolate and candy as well as the No. 2 position in gum Our 80,000 Makers and Bakers are located in our operations in more than 80 countries and are working to sell our products in over 150 countries around the world. They are energized for growth and critical to us living our purpose and values. We are a diverse community that can make things happen, and happen fast. Join us and Make It An Opportunity!
